title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 602.2 - Exemptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 602.2 - Exemptions

State Regulations

No permit is required for the use of water for agricultural
purposes, or the installation of a fire well to which no pumping equipment is
permanently attached when such well is installed by a municipal corporation, fire district or duly organized fire company or department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
602.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
